title: Mister Buddwing (movie) 1966 James Garner
content:
Great typography throughout the film. Shot in NYC. INterested in the font used in the titles, but don’t have a sample.

 [‹ (x) Savage Tide energetic script - Banshee {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190049/http:/typophile.com/node/27408 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Nike New Spring '06 Apparel ad - Victory {Dav} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080312190049/http:/typophile.com/node/27305 "Go to next forum topic")
author: timfm

comments.content: That’s funny - just last night I was wondering what typeface was used in the Rockford Files...

The movie title is certainly done by hand.

Kenyon Hopkins looks like Compacta.
The font used for the titles/credits in the film is different. Still trying to track down a sample.
